title.rendered: Scotland Women vs Ireland Women, 2nd T20I: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Tips

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Pitch Report

First innings average score: 170

Second innings average: 142

Type: Decent batting wicket.

Time: September 6, 5.30 PM IST

Teams

Probable XI for Scotland: Sarah Bryce (c & wk), Ailsa Lister, Abbi Aitken Drummond, Saskia Horley, Lorna Jack, Priyanaz Chatterji, Katie McGill, Megan McColl, Rachel Slater, Abtaha Maqsood, Katherine Fraser

Probable XI for Ireland: Gaby Lewis, Amy Hunter, Orla Prendergast, Laura Delany (c), Eimear Richardson, Shauna Kavanagh, Mary Waldron (wk), Arlene Kelly, Leah Paul, Georgina Dempsey, Cara Murray

Also Read:

Pakistan vs Afghanistan, Asia Cup 2022 Fantasy Picks

Barbados vs Trinbago Fantasy Tips

Form Concern

Abbi Aitken has been struggling for runs in 2022. She has managed only 71 runs in 5 innings, including a duck in the first game.

Game Changers

Gaby Lewis might have been dismissed for only 1 in the first game, but it is important to recognize that her role is to go hammer and tongs in the powerplay. She has accumulated 312 runs in her last 10 T20Is, including the highest score of 105*.

Smart Picks

As wickets kept falling at the other end, Saskia Horley in her T20I debut displayed great temperament by scoring a 42-ball 52 (6 fours and 1 six). The fact that she put a price on her wicket will excite fantasy players.

Sarah Bryce could be a decent pick in the wicketkeeper category. Besides inflicting 3 dismissals, she has added 134 runs, including the highest score of 36 in her last 5 competitive T20s.

Arlene Kelly not only picked 2 wickets but also generated handy bonus points for maintaining an impressive economy of 3 RPO. For the year, she has taken 7 wickets in as many games in the format.

Although Ireland lost the opening T20I, Katherine Fraser kept the fantasy players happy by dismissing the Irish openers cheaply. In 2022, she has bagged 9 wickets in 5 attempts.

Power Players

For Ireland, it was the Orla Prendergast and Laura Delany show. The duo stitched a 99-run partnership to see their side home. While Prendergast hammered 75 off 45, Delany made a huge difference in fantasy leagues by scoring an unbeaten 36 to go with her solitary wicket of Priyanaz Chatterji.

Fantasy Tip of The Day

Going by recent history and form, constructing your fantasy teams with a 7-4 combination in favour of Ireland could be beneficial.
